org.araneaframework.integration.spring
Class AraneaSpringDispatcherServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.araneaframework.http.core.BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet
              org.araneaframework.integration.spring.AraneaSpringDispatcherServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class AraneaSpringDispatcherServlet
extends BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet

Aranea dispatcher servlet that assembles Aranea components according to the configuration specified in Spring bean configuration files.

See Also:

buildRootComponent

protected ServletServiceAdapterComponent buildRootComponent()
Description copied from class: BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet
Builds the default (and in most cases only) root component of this servlet. All the requests (GET & POST) through some root component, when no alternate root components are defined, requests will always go through the root component built here.

Specified by:
buildRootComponent in class BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet
Returns:
default root component

getEnvironmentEntries

protected Map<Class<?>,Object> getEnvironmentEntries()
Overrides:
getEnvironmentEntries in class BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet

isSpringWebPresent

protected boolean isSpringWebPresent()
Returns true if Spring web application context is present. When web application context is present, dispatcher servlet will use it, instead of creating new BeanFactory itself. This method should only be called after init() has run.

Since:
1.1
